reviewText:
THIS DVD ARRIVED PROMPTLY. AS FOR THE CONTENT,  REV. KENNETH E. HAGIN IS ONE OF MY FAVORITE MINISTER/EVANGELISTS. HE TELLS THE TRUTH OF THE GOSPEL AND IS SINCERE. THIS RATING IS BASED ON MY KNOWLEDGE OF THIS MAN AS A MINISTER OF THE GOSPEL AND HAVING BEEN TO SEVERAL OF HIS CAMPMEETINGS IN TULSA. THIS IS A GREAT MESSAGE FOR ANY CHRISTIAN.

AS FAR AS THE PRODUCT ITSELF, DELIVERY WAS PROMPT AND IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. PRICE IS GOOD AND I RECOMMEND IT.
